channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report X-2024070710
item.description:
Report X-2024070710

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-08
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package leaked from under vented cap after unloading during inspection for hazmat acceptance processing. Package put in improper orientation while being prepared for RTS due to improper hazmat certification (technical name formatting).
